properties.markdownProperty: Object archetypes follow an structure similar to document archetypes structure. Archetype groups folders must be named as *XX_group_name* where '*XX*' is a number (00, 01, ... 99) and '*group_name*' is the name of the archetype group. Inside each group folder there is an *objects* folder, a *objects.xml* file and optionally an *assets* directory. The *objects.xml* has all the identifiers of the objects archetypes so they can be distinguished from other objects that are not archetypes but part of them.
